A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I have been a life long star wars fan.. & this I instalement of the franchise was just God aweful. With all the hype\, and anticipation since episode 7\, this was just too big of a let down. We all understand the ploy to dsomething \"new & fresh\" however this was just upsetting. The lack of a plot was compensated with by arguably\, even worse slap stick humor. It left the next & final episode to be filmed on no substance with no suspense. This movie is almost as bad as episode 1.. it's hard to our George Lucas\, George Lucas.. but congrats Johnson & Kennedy\, you guys made a valiant effort. You had multiple fan theories circulation... & some of them were terrible.. but not as bad as what was chosen to happen in this movie.
